SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Delivery Group Fields

The Order Delivery Group object defines a group of order products belonging to one order to be fulfilled using the same delivery method and delivered to the same recipient. In Order Management, you usually interact with order delivery group summaries instead of order delivery groups.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Delivery Group object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Created By	The user who created the order delivery group record.
Created Date	The date when the order delivery group record was created.
Deliver To address	The delivery address for the products in the order delivery group.
Deliver To Name	The name of the recipient for the delivery.
Delivery Instructions	Special instructions for the delivery of the order products in the order delivery group.
Delivery Subtotal	

he sum of all delivery subtotal amounts on the order products in the order delivery group.

On an order product, the delivery subtotal equals the quantity ordered multiplied by the unit price, before adjustments and tax.


Delivery Subtotal with Tax	

The sum of all delivery subtotal with tax amounts on the order products in the delivery group.

On an order product, the delivery subtotal with tax amount equals the quantity multiplied by the unit price, plus tax, before adjustments.


Delivery Tax	

The sum of all delivery tax amounts on the order products in the order delivery group.

On an order product, the delivery tax equals the total tax for the order product.


Description	The description of the order delivery group.
Desired Delivery Date	The desired delivery date for the order products in the order delivery group.
Email Address	The customer’s email address.
Gift Message	The customer-defined gift message for the order products in the delivery group.
Is Gift	Indicates whether the order products in the order delivery group are gifts.
Last Modified By	The user who last changed the order delivery group record.
Last Modified Date	The date when the order delivery group record was last changed.
Order	The parent order for the order delivery group. An order can have multiple order delivery groups.
Order Delivery Group Number	The number of the order delivery group.
Order Delivery Method	The order delivery method for the order delivery group.
Phone Number	The customer’s phone number.
Pretax Total	

The sum of all Pretax Total fields on the order products in the order delivery group.

On an order product, the pretax total equals the quantity ordered multiplied by the unit price, before adjustments and tax.


Promised Delivery Date	The promised delivery date for the order products in the order delivery group.
Related Order Delivery Group	The original order delivery group. Used for reference when a change order is created.
Total Adjustments	The total, not including tax, of all adjustments made to the order products in the order delivery group.
Total Adjustments with Tax	The total, including tax, of all adjustments made to the order products in the order delivery group.
Total Adjustments Tax	The tax on the total adjustments.
Total Tax	The sum of all the total tax amounts on the order products in the order delivery group.
Total with Tax	The sum of the order delivery group’s total delivery amount and total tax amount.

title: Understanding Order Delivery Groups in Salesforce
